string-array.name: ThemeChangelog
string-array.item:
v7.0.0 - Mon, 24-12-2018
- Migrate support library to AndroidX.
- Initial support for Android 9.0.
- Added Cranberry and Raspberry accents.
- Added option for QS tiles background shape.
- Added option for Settings dashboard icons background shape.
- Themed more Settings icons.
- Translucent style improvements.
- Themed Digital Wellbeing.
- Themed YouTube (only solid style for now).
- Themed AOSP Launcher3.
- Updated Google Dialer overlay to v25.0.220310144.
- Updated Magisk resources to v6.0.1.
- Updated Google Tasks overlay to v1.2.216368383.release.
- Updated Play service overlay to 14.7.99.
- Hide some overlays which is not ready yet.
